A Legacy Rooted in Nature

Discover the heart and philosophy behind Swastham Ayurveda.

Our Philosophy:
Healing from the Root

At Swastham Ayurveda, we don’t just treat symptoms; we journey with you to the root cause of imbalance. Our practice is founded on the timeless wisdom that the body has an innate intelligence to heal itself when given the right support.

We believe in a deeply personalized approach, understanding that your path to wellness is as unique as you are. Through authentic therapies, pure herbal preparations, and compassionate guidance, we help you reconnect with your body’s natural state of harmony.

The Swastham Approach: Our Pillars of Care

Root-Cause Diagnosis

We utilize traditional Ayurvedic diagnostic methods (Nadi Pariksha) to understand the fundamental imbalance causing your health concerns.

Personalized Healing

Your treatment plan is crafted exclusively for you, considering your unique body constitution (Prakriti) and current state of imbalance (Vikriti).

Authentic Therapies

We use only classical Ayurvedic procedures and the purest, ethically sourced herbal preparations to ensure safe and effective healing.

Our Sanctuary of Serenity

A glimpse into our healing space, designed for your comfort and peace.

Meet Our Vaidyas

The experienced and compassionate hands behind your healing journey.

Dr. Sasi Keezhattupurath
